message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I value it highly, but I'm willing to part with it for $1,500,000.  I believe it will be immensely beneficial to you as well.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to negotiate, but  $1,200,000 is still too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,250,000 for the product.
